title: fry
description: Everyone has their favourite additions to a basic chicken stir-fry - feel free to adapt the recipe to include yours.Each serving provides 617kcal, 47g protein, 56g carbohydrate (of which 8g sugars),	22g fat (of which 4.5g saturates), 6g fibre and 3.5g salt.
ingredients: ½ red pepper, seeds removed, thinly sliced
30g/1oz mangetout, green beans or sugar snap peas
1 nest of egg noodles, cooked according to the packet instructions
